text: Consider a new kind of flip-flop X-Y flip-flop. When X=Y=0, the flip-flop is set to zero. When X=1, Y=1, the flip- flop is set to one. When XY, the flip-flop complements its state. consider a flip flop implemented with the help of X-Y flip-flop: Q XY A The flip flop implemented is (a) J-K flip-flop (b) S-R flip-flop (Â©) D flip-flop () T flip-flop
